en: Jehovah, thou hast been favorable unto thy land; Thou hast brought back the captivity of Jacob.
hmr: LALPA i ram chunga hin i lâwm a, Jakobrawi sala an um chu i ṭhuoi kîr nâwk a.

en: Thou hast forgiven the iniquity of thy people; Thou hast covered all their sin. [Selah
hmr: I mihai rîtlona i ngaidam a, An suolna po po chu în khum zo tah.

en: Thou hast taken away all thy wrath; Thou hast turned thyself from the fierceness of thine anger.
hmr: I lunginsenna po po chu i lâk hmang a, I lunginsenna nasatak chu i nghatsan tah a.

en: Turn us, O God of our salvation, And cause thine indignation toward us to cease.
hmr: Aw, a mi sandamtu Pathien, mîn nghatkîrtir la, Kan chungah i lunginsenna chu sukbo rawh.

en: Wilt thou be angry with us for ever? Wilt thou draw out thine anger to all generations?
hmr: Kan chungah i lunginsen kumkhuo ding am a nih? I lunginsen chu suon po po chenin în langtir pei ding am a nih?

en: Wilt thou not quicken us again, That thy people may rejoice in thee?
hmr: Nangmaa chun i mihai an hlim theina dingin, I mi sukhar nâwk naw ding am a nih?

en: Show us thy lovingkindness, O Jehovah, And grant us thy salvation.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i zainêmna chu mîn hmutir la, I sandamna chu mi pe bawk la,

en: I will hear what God Jehovah will speak; For he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints: But let them not turn again to folly.
hmr: Pathien LALPA thu hril ding chu ngai ka ta, A mihai le a mi inthienghai kuomah lungmuongna thu a hril ding a ni sih a; Nisienlakhawm, anni chu invêtna tieng ngha nâwk ta naw raw hai se.

en: Surely his salvation is nigh them that fear him, That glory may dwell in our land.
hmr: A sandamna chu ama ṭituhai hnaia chun a um ngei ngei hlak a nih; Ei rama hin ropuina a um theina dingin.

en: Mercy and truth are met together; Righteousness and peace have kissed each other.
hmr: Ngilneina le thutak ân tuok a, Felna le remna an infâwp a.

en: Truth springeth out of the earth; And righteousness hath looked down from heaven.
hmr: Thutak chu hnuoia inthawkin ân der suok a, Felna chun vâna inthawkin a hung en thla tah a.

en: Yea, Jehovah will give that which is good; And our land shall yield its increase.
hmr: Anih, LALPA chun thil ṭha pêng a ta, Ei ram hin a thilkak chu pe bawk a tih.

en: Righteousness shall go before him, And shall make his footsteps a way to walk in.
hmr: Felna chun hma ṭhuoi a ta, A kehnunghai chu felna dinga lampuiah siem a tih.
